alert.note: Alert for Preston; Tucker (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 03 at 2:00PM EDT until June 03 at 2:15PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN TUCKER AND SOUTHEASTERN PRESTON COUNTIES... At 159 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Kingwood, moving southwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines, resulting in some power outages. Locations impacted include... Kingwood, Terra Alta, Rowlesburg, Aurora, Cathedral State Park, and Elgon. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.
